nodes.title: Write a C/C++/Java program to accept a coordinate point in a XY coordinate system and determine in which quadrant the coordinate point lies.
Write a C/C++/Java program to find whether a given year is a leap year or not.
Write a C/C++/Java program to enter three side of triangle and check whether the triangle valid or not.
Write a C/C++/Java program to accept two integers and check whether they are equal or not.
Write a C/C++/Java program to input a number and check whether it is positive or negative.
Write a C/C++/Java program to input a number and check whether it is even or odd.
Write a C/C++/Java program to input a number. If the number is even, print its square otherwise print its cube.
Write a C/C++/Java program to read the age of a candidate and determine whether it is eligible for casting his/her own vote.
Write a C/C++/Java program to print Hello World.
Write a C/C++/Java program to input a character and check that it’s a vowel or a consonant.
Write a C/C++/Java program to input a character and check that it’s a small letter, capital letter, a digit or a special symbol.
Write a C/C++/Java program to calculate area of an equilateral triangle.
Write a C/C++/Java program to enter three angles and check whether the triangle valid or not.
Write a C/C++/Java program to read the value of an integer m and display the value of n is 1 when m is larger than 0, 0 when m is 0 and -1 when m is less than 0.
Write a C/C++/Java program to enter three angle of triangle and check whether the right triangle or not.
Write a C/C++/Java program to enter three angles of triangle and check whether the triangle is Obtuse or not.
Write a C/C++/Java program to read any day number in integer and display day name in the word.
Write a C/C++/Java program to input month number and print number of days in that month.
Write a C/C++/Java program to find out the largest between three numbers.
Write a C/C++/Java program to enter three angles of triangle and check whether the triangle is Acute or not.

An Insurance company follows following rules to calculate premium If a person’s health is excellent and the person is between 25 and 35 years of age and lives in a city and is a male then the premium is Rs. 4 per thousand and his policy amount cannot exceed Rs. 2 lakhs. −If a person satisfies all the above conditions except that the sex is female then the premium is Rs. 3 per thousand and her policy amount cannot exceed Rs. 1 lakh −If a person’s health is poor and the person is between 25 and 35 years of age and lives in a village and is a male then the premium is Rs. 6 per thousand and his policy cannot exceed Rs. 10,000 −In all other cases the person is not insured. Write a program to output whether the person should be insured or not, his/her premium rate and maximum amount for which he/she can be insured.

The current year and the year in which the employee joined the organization are entered through the keyboard. If the number of years for which the employee has served the organization is greater than 3 then a bonus of Rs. 2500/- is given to the employee. If the years of service are not greater than 3, then the program should do nothing.
Write a C/C++/Java program to check whether a number is negative, positive or zero.
Write a C/C++/Java program to read any Month Number in integer and display the number of days for this month.
Write a C/C++/Java program to input week number and print week day.
Write a C/C++/Java program to enter three angles of triangle and check whether the triangle is Obtuse or not.

Write a C/C++/Java While purchasing certain items, a discount of 10% is offered if the quantity purchased is more than 1 000. If quantity and price per item are input through the keyboard, write a program to calculate the total expenses.
Write a C/C++/Java program to find out the smallest between three numbers.
Write a C/C++/Java program to check whether a number is divisible by 5 and 11 or not.
Write a C/C++/Java program to count total number of notes in given amount.
Write a C/C++/Java program to calculate the root of a Quadratic Equation.
Write a C/C++/Java program to check whether a character is uppercase or lowercase alphabet.
